question: List angiocrine factors
ideal_answer: Angiocrine factors are: Ccl4, neurotensin, vascular endothelial growth factor, metalloproteinases-1, thrombospondin 3, Slit2, hepatocyte growth factor, Wnt2.

snippets.text: vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF)-A was identified as the most abundantly expressed factor,
angiocrine factors tissue inhibitor of metalloproteinases-1 (Timp-1) and thrombospondin 3 (THBS3)
We found that Slit2, which is negatively regulated by endothelial EphA2 receptor, is one such tumor suppressive angiocrine factor.
angiocrine factors, including hepatocyte growth factor (HGF) and Wnt2.

exact_answer: Ccl4, neurotensin, vascular endothelial growth factor, metalloproteinases-1, thrombospondin 3, Slit2, hepatocyte growth factor, Wnt2
